channel.title: [562/602] Webclient HELP! [562/602]
channel.description: I have hosted a webclient in the past. I still have mine running. I am trying to switch my forums from .webs website to .ucoz website. I used the same method for .webs website for .ucoz and it does not work. I am using a webclient HTML Code, and it said to rename file to client.jar and i have done so. But my client is not working on the ucoz site. can someone please help me with this whole ucoz site webclient thing? I have jarred and signed my client correctly.

item.title: [562/602] Webclient HELP! [562/602]
item.dc:creator: @Drew-Sker Drew-Sker
item.description:
@Drew-Sker wrote:

I have hosted a webclient in the past. I still have mine running. I am trying to switch my forums from .webs website to .ucoz website. I used the same method for .webs website for .ucoz and it does not work. I am using a webclient HTML Code, and it said to rename file to client.jar and i have done so. But my client is not working on the ucoz site. can someone please help me with this whole ucoz site webclient thing? I have jarred and signed my client correctly.
